name: Sandra Brunner

text: Went here on a recommendation of a friend. The ingredients are fresh and the spicy pizza sauce was good, but that is were the good things end. They burned the pizza and dough nut appetizer.  They "lost" my wife's pizza and then took forever ‚Ä¶More

name: Denise Webster
text: Food was good,workers were nice. But the place was filthy. There was only 2 clean tables, one by the trash can. The bath room had nothing to dry your hands with. The employees stood and watched as we cleaned our table to eat at. Mind you no ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Schill
text: This Blaze Pizza location is the best!!  Nice employees, great service and atmosphere.  Much better than any pizza joint in the area!  10/10 would recommend!

name: Dennis Martin
text:
I was here on a Friday night at 6 o‚Äôclock at 6:40 I still did not have my pizzas to carry out. The staff was a hot mess behind the counter,
all very nice,  but had no idea what they were doing. When I asked about where ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeremy Koscielny
text: First time here. Employees were very nice explaining how things work. Did pick you own  pizza. Cooked fast. Tasted great

name: Kimberly Russell
text: So so good. Personal gluten free white top, no bacon, add red bell peppers and spinach. Yummy. And very reasonably priced.

name: Adam Kuhn
text: Love the entire chain but the staff at this location are exceptional. They are always friendly, quick, and willing to do whatever it takes to make our experience stand out.

name: Chris Smith
text: Working in EMS we sometimes get called away from a meal, sometimes even before we get our food. These folks remade our food for us when it took over an hour and a half to get back. They will forever have my business. They were professional, ‚Ä¶More

name: Garrett Shaw
text: Excellent pizza and great service.  The pizza is a little on the small side so you can get one per person.  Everyone gets to add whatever toppings you want, which gives it the special touch.  The crust is thin just how I like it.   Make sure you try it out

name: Steven Diaz
text: Nick (Dizi) Gave awesome customer service plus makes some delicious pizza‚Äôs

name: Tim Spurlock
text: Never going back again Worst experiences ever! There is nothing like cold Pizza

name: Bethanie Reed
text: The sauce the cheese the toppings MAN this is some good freaking pizza! Best I've had in history this is my new pizza place. 12 out of 10 my family rates it. Will be trying every possible combination you guys surpassed our expectations. Got ‚Ä¶More

name: Haley Tatum
text: I LOVE THIS PLACE! It is a pizza lover‚Äôs dream! üòç

name: Lyndsey Andreasen
text: Great 1st time experience here. Fast with friendly service. Pizzas were delicious and I loved the blood orange lemonade! Restaurant was very clean. Nice little spot to grab a pizza on the go!

name: Kenneth Stem
text: First time in today. Pretty decent pizza and relatively friendly people.  If there is any knock it is price. But all in all worth a trip.

name: Lexi Elizabeth
text: I had the best experience at blaze tonight! I‚Äôve become familiar with a few of the employees..Rachel, Kayla, Tammy, and Alexis. Tonight I got to talk with Kayla and Tammy about how my ex boyfriend, who I came in with all the time, and how ‚Ä¶More

name: Brad Schelling
text: A go to location for our family when traveling through.  Check them out! Great pizza and quick service with a friendly staff.

name: Benjamin Lippert
text: Amazing place! I enjoyed how personal the staff were, even asked me if it was my first time there. I ate the Meat Lovers and it was really good, adding black and green olives makes the Meat Lovers pizza even better! This is a must-go place.

name: Terrance Mickens
text: Dizi , Reese and Ethan had amazing customer service and the food was phenomenal I'll be back

name: Eric Cason
text: Great vegan options, delicious food, friendly service. All around good experience eating in or carry out

name: Victoria Edwards
text: Delivery was very fast and the toppings were delicious. However, this time and the past two times I ordered the bottom of the pizza was burned. I can't be too picky with my options as a vegan, so I still eat it and will continue to order ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Roaden
text: Best place to get pizza in Murfreesboro. Thank you for a wonderful meal everytime we come.

name: Glenn Bidwell
text: Best pizza in town, pizza toppings are fresh, crust is cooked just the way you want it. Super friendly staff, great value for money. What more could you want.

name: sophia sweet treats Carrier
text: Always on time and delicious. I like the online ordering üòÉ

text: Usually good but your recent customer service was rediculous. You forgot my sauce and toppings and suggested it was because I didn't ask the staff for extra when I made an online order for takeout. My pizza was already done when I arrived. ‚Ä¶More

text: Fabulous experience at the Murfreesboro location! We're traveling through town and staying at a local hotel; I had never heard of Blaze Pizza, but the concept, pics, menu, and reviews all looked good, so we decided to give it a try. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tim Williams
text: This was hands down one of the best pizza related experiences that I have had the opportunity to partake in.  I ordered two large pizzas and they were ready for pick up fairly quick. Everything was spot on. Please treat yourself. I drive from Nashville to Murfreesboro. It‚Äôs definitely worth it.

name: Yattap Pumphrey
text: Great service friendly staff and Thanks to them they have converted me from Pizza Hut

name: Lane Franklin
text: Friendly staff! Lots of toppings. Great first visit!

name: Maria Smith
text: While getting our orders taken, my boyfriend made a joke as saying that we had separate orders because of my attitude and the dark haired girl proceeded to snicker and say ‚Äúdamn thats tough‚Äù. Kinda ridiculous and flirty if you ask me. The food was good though.

name: George Gaskill
text: Great Pizza at a great price.  Very fast also.

name: Nicole jenkins
text: Love it tones of crust options including gluten free and they have daiya cheese.

name: tony jones
text: This pizza is really good. I've been on the edge of wanting to try it out for awhile now and we did. I think my family may have a great new pizza joint now.

name: Dean Heasley
text: I love the concept and the execution of this restaurant. The food is very good. Their personal pizzas are very large considering they are for just one person. All the toppings were super fresh. My only critique is the "Dough Knots" were a ‚Ä¶More

name: Randy Rodden
text: They really need a kids meal or pizza. It's only one size of pizza so my son got an adult pepperoni pizza. Other than that,  tasty pizza and great staff.

name: Ariana Gomez
text: Olivia was her name I think was so very patient with me as I was deciding to make a choice on my pizza and she helped me get the best pizza I‚Äôve had ever !! Will definitely be coming back whenever I‚Äôm in town again !! #goodserviceolivia

name: Christina Lowe
text: This was my first visit and it was good, for being a Saturday night and they were really busy! The 1/2 pizza and salad is the right choice for me. It's the exact amount I need without feeling stuffed. The Greek salad is very, very good!! I highly recommend and will be back again.

name: Phillip Whaling
text: Great pizza for cheap. You can't really beat it at this price range.

name: Cayce Winkler
text: Every time I have eaten Blaze pizza, it has been great. The pizza is cooked perfectly and the staff was friendly. These past couple of times when ordering pickup, my pizza was cold and the staff said nothing to me as they handed me my ‚Ä¶More

name: drosos29
text: Great pizza, unlimited toppings and helpful/friendly staff.  The cauliflower crust is delicious!

name: Sara Roberts
text: I tried this place for the first time yesterday! The ingredients are super fresh and they make your pizza right in front of you as you choose your toppings! I will be back for sure!

name: A.T. Coffee
text: First everything was prefect fast friendly  service, Fresh cook to order food ,clean helpful warm atmosphere and healthy options.  Our group has several different dietary needs and all 4 were met with out any problems including Vegetarian and keto,been afew times just as good as the first time üòäüëåüèΩ

text: Attended the grand opening (and free pizza offer) at Blaze Pizza - Murfreesboro. Overall...good pizza. Really loved the crust, it is thin (they offer a thick crust and gluten free version) and crispy but not cardboard. I felt they were a ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff Stiriz
text: Great pizza. Tried the keto dough and the kids had regular dough. Amazing choices for dough, sauces, and topping selections. Prices are good as well. And I love the option to completely build your own with as many toppings as you like. Food also came out quickly as well. 2 thumbs up from entire family.

name: Marija Mitchell
text: I have tried 3 different pickup methods with this location in Murfreesboro and they all have been bad. 1st time- in person I waited in line while three people said nothing to me and continued to do online orders which is fine but say you‚Äôll ‚Ä¶More

name: Saffr0nCha0
text: Poor service. Very slow. Forgot a pizza that was ordered. Not a well run establishment. Go elsewhere for better service,price and pizza.

name: Kristin Jackson
text: Very average. My kids got a one topping pizza and as you can see from the picture, the cheese was severely lacking almost to the point of being inedible. If you want something super fast, mediocre taste, and average service, this is your place.

name: Tamara Thompson
text: I am a regular at blaze and I absolutely am the biggest fan. Great service! Great flavorful pizzas and loads of variety! The sweet dark curly haired   girl never fails to make my day or make my kids smile from ear to ear. I‚Äôll never stop eating at the Murfreesboro location!!

name: Adam
text: The pizza is great and amazing choices.

name: Keith Landers
text:
So if you are looking for the best pizza in the world this is not your place. If you are looking for really really good pizza that includes all the toppings you want for a nice size pizza for dinner not 8 bucks - this place
Seriously rocks

name: Shannon Harris
text: It was and excellent! ü§ügreat pizza, quick service, friendly staff.

name: Russell Bradshaw
text: I don't usually enjoy thin crust style but these pizzas are delicious. The price seems very reasonable and even when there's a line I've never had to wait very long. I also appreciate the number of non-traditional sodas and alternatives. They carry Blue Sky sodas and several teas and juices.

name: Marcie Nance
text: Great food and friendly helpful employees!

name: Geoffrey Donnell
text: First time in and I must say, the vibe in here is amazing! Such team spirit! It‚Äôs awesome to see everyone working great together. Kayla is doing an amazing job tonight. She came by and made sure everything was perfect! She was encouraging her team. She was wonderful! I will definitely be back and the keto pizza is amazing!!

name: Wendy Biorato
text: Have always loved this place, now with covid19 we order online and they bring it to our car!

name: Brady
text: Your customers won‚Äôt love you if you give bad service, but at least your competitors will!

name: Princella Smith
text: Delicious pizza with fresh ingredients. Love the variety, price, and taste. Not greasy. Just fresh crust and toppings out of the stone oven.

name: Molly Stephens
text: Kyle had amazing customer service and a great attitude! My family and I love coming to blaze especially when there are great employees working like him!!!! P.S. Jacob is so cute!

name: Diane Bates

text: This was my 1st visit.... The pizza and staff was AWESOME!! You can get your pizza custom made how you want it.  I will definitely go back.

text: Always a great place to get the pizza I want! Not what the store picks out for you. All the toppings you could ever want on your build ur own pizza!

text: It had good flavor, but my jaw got sore from the pizza crust. I was hoping for a bit more of a crunchy crust. Not too pricey though, so that was nice!

-Employees are not friendly. They never smile.

text: The food is incredible! The staff is so friendly and checks to make sure your food is just right. The have a variety of choices for different pizzas; all of which are delicious! The food is made so fast and comes out blazed and fires! Definitely would recommend and is a family favorite!

text: The brick oven taste is perfect as well as we can make it EXACTLY the way each one of us want our pizza.... Think Subway for pizza meets Brick Oven Pizza.

text: The food was fresh but really didn't wow me. We ordered many different types and all shared and they were all just kinda eh

text: This place was really good! Veggies and meat taste fresh. Food came out quick. Prices are very respectable for what you get. The staff and manage (I assume he was the manager) were very nice. I came in alone with my 3 kids and was treated like I was in a 5 star restaurant.

name: Morgan Hawes
text: Had a great experience with curbside!! Thankful for y‚Äôall staying open!

name: Chris Zimmer
text: Blaze makes a decent enough pizza quickly. It is far superior to dominos, pizza hut, or papa John's but if you have a local NY style pizza joint that sells by the slice, go there instead.

text: The atmosphere here, and employees are welcoming and the pizza I got...OMG it's amazing

name: Thomas Sidley
text: It's just amazing and much more fun to build your own pizza

name: Joshua Jones
text: These guys are the definition of customer service. Ordered online and forgot to get Cauliflower crust which is what my fiancee wanted. Called into the store and manager swapped the order immediately and didn't put me through the hassle of cancelling my order and reordering. Definitely appreciated and pizza was great.

name: Nick Gristy
text: Pizza was good but they need to send the crew to learn at the Brentwood location. They was extremely busy and trying to cook the pizza a little too fast. Toppings were fresh.

name: Amanda Torres
text: Real fast for a made to order pizza. Taste great, cost wasn't too high, and the workers were all helpful, even to a crazy lady with face tattoos ü§£

text: Super friendly staff!  Individual customized pizza made fresh.  The 'Spicy Link' pizza was fabulous.   A true vegan selection made it nice for my guest.

name: Johnnie Whitfield
text: Blaze Pizza is a great stop. They make your pizza right in front of you. Pile it high or leave it light, anything you want. Try mixing Italian sausage and grilled chicken... my favorite. Great mix of drinks too. Five üåü.

name: Tyler Chatman
text: I love molly she‚Äôs the best and Kyle is frikkin amazing. First time customer. Loved it. :)

name: John Long
text:
My 1st visit to Blaze Pizza and I absolutely loved it. I got the red vine pizza and added meatballs. Sooo tasty.
The garlic knots are pretty awesome too. Even the bloodorange lemonade rocked. Will definitely be back.

name: Amy Jackson
text: To give them the benefit of the doubt,  my sister and I went here on the 4th of July,  so maybe everyone there was grumpy about working on a holiday.  There was no clear signage as to where to order. We kind of wandered up to the counter ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeanette Stevens
text: The best pizza I've found in Murfreesboro (if you like thin crust). The options are so varied, and the price is incredible!

text: First Time here. Alexie made me the best Pizza. Thank you! Great service with a smile.

name: Amy Rash Dabney

text: A little too crispy on the bottom, but otherwise really good concept and potential. Pizzas cooked like this are an art, so a little char will happen sometimes, even my favorite places randomly have this happen. Was just on lunch and didn't have time for them to remake it. Will definitely try again though

name: Jennifer McKarns
text: I am a whole foods plant based eater. Here I made my own pizza....no cheese, just hummus and lots of veggies on my pizza! Yummy!

name: Angela Wade
text: Great pizza, nice atmosphere.  A must try if near the avenue.

name: Glen Howard
text: One of my favorite pizza chains.

name: Michelle Young
text: Choose your own pizza adventure! The selection and quality of toppings are excellent. My only complaint with this location is the wait time. During peak times, prepare to wither away in line while you anticipate your custom creation. I've found that ordering ahead online can help you beat the line and get your pizza with ease!

name: Danielle FitzPatrick
text: After our favorite stop in town closed up we found ourselves looking for another inexpensive quick option to eat at. My son and I loved it. The ordering experience is different and awesome. Our pizza was delicious. The place was neat clean. ‚Ä¶More

name: Christopher Brown
text: Great pizza, amazingly fast. Had 40 people in-front of us and they managed to get us pizza in about 10 minutes. The pizza is thin and crispy, if your looking for a thick greasy pizza this is not your place. Great crust, sauce, toppings, and service. Would highly recommend.

name: Chuck Hirsbrunner
text: Clean place good pizza and quick

name: William Tousignant
text: It is just pizza nothing special

name: trivial_dissent
text: I've only visited this place once, but the staff was extremely helpful and the pizza was superb.

name: Poliala Mahoney
text: We have been to Blaze more times than I can count. Since they‚Äôve opened they have become our families favorite spot. Pizzas are delicious and the service is great!

name: Charles Rogers
text: nice  folks. Good pizza

name: Gary Smith
text: I love Blaze Pizza and a great place to dine. The workers are very friendly.

name: Casey Craft
text: WOW! Great family Pizza Place.  Cozy atmosphere, great music, Authentic Fire Oven, literally all üî•

name: Kay Lambert
text: My favorite thin crust pizza! Hands down  My kids ask to go here all the time.  Best part for us: gf crust and vegan cheese makes it possible for our whole family to enjoy.  And they are super fast!

text: Best pizza place in town hands down. We have eaten there several times and love to bring family whenever they come to town. Today they messed up our order and not only let us keep the pizza they made incorrectly, they also have us a coupon for a free pizza. Excellent pizza and excellent customer service.

name: Hillary Yeager
text: Amazing pizza and so happy that they have keto crust! I made my own and did half and half. Really great service and friendly faces!

name: A Castle
text: Good pizza and quick.

name: Charles Powell

text: Ordered the keto crust pizza and nothing on my pizza was warm, but the crust. You could see where the crust was about to burn, so they pulled it out, but all the toppings were cold. My husbands normal pizza was fine though.

name: Kenneth Lacy
text: I love Blaze.  The ingredients and final product are awesome!  At times, the service is spotty where one visit they are helpful and the next, they appear to really dislike their job. I am unsure if it is because summer recess and the employees are inexperienced, but it can be a little disappointing.

name: D
text: My go to place for pizza. Love the brick oven style and flavor. If you like pesto and chicken then get the Green Stripe signature pizza!

name: Olyvia Williams
text: Small,  and price is high but good food

name: Brian Toungette
text: Fantastic oven fired pizza! Pick one from the menu or build your own.

name: Brandon Emery
text: Blaze was really a pretty good experience! Build your own pizza a la subway type assembly  line and it is fired and ready in just a few short minutes. Pizza was tasty and cost was reasonable  for what you get!

name: Tyler Andrews
text: Keto pizza!? Build your own? I'm sold. Doesn't hurt that the staff is consistently helpful and friendly, either!

name: Josh Dixon
text: Delicious pizza and garlic knots! Love all the options and the fact that you can totally customize your pizza and that most of the add on toppings are free.

name: Wendi Harris
text: Last night 1st time got a keto pizza with pesto, mozzarella, chicken, bacon, arugula and red onion. That pizza was so dry and burnt around the edge made it hard to eat. Was so looking forward to pizza and something new üòî

text: Such a disappointment.  The ice dispenser was had slime hanging from it.  The manager just wiped it with a paper napkin!  The pizza has gone down hill.  Will not be back.

name: Sappler HD
text: Excellent pizza at excellent prices. The make-you-own style makes the pizza ordering process more enjoyable, I think. Their crusts are all vegan, their normal and spicy sauces are vegan (the spicy sauce is not good), and they offer plenty of vegan toppings.

name: L. H. Riggs
text: Really enjoy our pizza, salad & garlic knots. The staff were nice & helpful. We will go back when we are in AZ again.

name: Brandon Harris
text: Prices are pretty good and the ingredients you can't get in many other places. The build your own pizza is truly that. I've made some of the most delicious pizzas I've ever tasted in my life. There's no limit on the toppings. Very fulfilling also.

name: Mary Carlisle
text: Very professional, clean, and the pizza was great!

name: Lauren Russell
text: Clean, fast, friendly and delicious.

name: Matthew Minnich
text: I asked for keto crust and they assured me that they used it. Turns out they used regular dough and made my girlfriend fall out of ketosis.

text: Does not accommodate children. Pizza is soggy yet burnt. The only original flavor is burnt flour. Sauce is decent, but toppings are generic. Sweet tea was lightly sweetened. ‚Ä¶More

text: Pizza was pretty good. Wish i would uave asked for more cheese as after asking for extra cheese, there still wasn't enough cheese to cover the pizza properly. Pizza is thin and comes out fast. Better than pie five.
